Class CivModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • CivModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class CivModel
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class serves as the Model in MVC architecture and stores necessary information to run the game.
    Author:
    Anh Nguyen Phung, Hung Le Ba, Thu Tra, Peter Vo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • CivModel

        public CivModel​(java.lang.String fileName)
         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                java.io.IOException,
                java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Constructor. Creates an instance of CivModel with previously saved data
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the file where data is saved
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - cannot find the file
        java.io.IOException - problems with input file
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - cannot find required class (CivModel)

      • CivModel

        public CivModel()
        Constructor. Creates an instance of CivModel without saved data
